posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for:Moderator

2) Your age: 14

3) Your location: USA,Central

4) Current In-Game Name: the Human Aimbot

5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community Profile: http://steamcommunity.com/id/Mrvictorious

6) How did you find out about NNJG: Jailbreak

7) How long have you been involved with NNJG and/or Shadow's servers: 4-5 months

8) What you can bring to the NNJG Team:Moderation

9) Why do you want to be part of the NNJG Team:I want to become apart of the team because of the community, great staff, and I believe I can help moderate Jail.

10) Do you have any past experience with the position you're applying for: Nope

11) Do you own a decent microphone, and do you frequently utilize it: I have a decent microphone, and I use it frequently. 

12) Any other comments or information you can provide:
Edit: I am becoming more active on Jailbreak. I was too caught up in TTT.
